title: Natural Language Processing
subtitle: Computational techniques for understanding and generating human language

topics.title: Introduction to NLP
topics.description: Definition, applications, and challenges of NLP in real-world systems.

topics.title: Text Preprocessing
topics.description: Tokenization, stemming, lemmatization, and stopword removal techniques.

topics.title: Syntax and Parsing
topics.description: POS tagging, dependency and constituency parsing with grammar rules.

topics.title: Semantic Analysis
topics.description: Word sense disambiguation, named entity recognition, and semantic role labeling.

topics.title: Language Modeling
topics.description: N-gram models, smoothing, and probabilistic language modeling concepts.

topics.title: Text Classification
topics.description: Spam detection, sentiment analysis using Naive Bayes, SVM, and deep learning.

topics.title: Machine Translation
topics.description: Rule-based and statistical translation, neural machine translation (NMT).

topics.title: Dialogue Systems and Chatbots
topics.description: Architecture of conversational agents, intent detection, and response generation.
